article_title: The seven presidential candidates on the issues
article_text:
Thank you for reading 14 free articles on our site. og.description: Calls for extending a tax cut of up to $2,500 per student to help deal with college costs. Says she would invest in infrastructure, clean energy, and scientific and medical research to strengthen the economy. Says she would “close corporate tax loopholes and make the most fortunate pay their fair share.”
